data.question: What is the formula for the unprecedented infinite lanthanide hydroxide ribbons mentioned?
What unique system was utilized to achieve the synthesis of the lanthanide hydroxide ribbons?
True or False: The synthesis of the lanthanide hydroxide ribbons resulted in optically active crystals.
What is the yield percentage for the crystal synthesis of Nd(NO3)3 directed by H2Pra2biim?
What type of magnetic interactions have been observed in the synthesized materials?
data.answer: Ln–Ln antiferromagnetic coupling with magnetic anisotropy

data.question: True or False: The synthesized materials are single molecular magnets (SMMs).
What is the space group of the crystals synthesized from the hydrothermal hydrolysis of Ln(NO3)3 directed by H2Pra2biim?
What is the role of NaOH in the synthesis of the lanthanide hydroxide ribbons?
data.answer: It is used in the presence of H2Pra2biim to produce the crystals.

data.question: True or False: The infinite lanthanide hydroxide chain is built of edge-sharing [Ln3(μ3-OH)] triangles.
What is the pitch of the right-handed helical chain formed by Nd3+ ions?
True or False: The coordination environment of Nd atoms includes both imidazole and propionate groups from Pra2biim2- ligands.
What is the temperature range used for the dc magnetic susceptibility studies of the synthesized materials?
True or False: The synthesized materials show promise for applications as contrast agents for magnetic resonance imaging.
What is the main challenge in constructing infinite lanthanide hydroxide chains according to the text?
data.answer: The rational design of supporting ligands for ligand-controlled hydrolysis.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized materials can be used as fixation media for atmospheric CO2.
What is the significance of the hexagonal orientations of peripheral six couples of twelve Pra2biim2- ligands?
data.answer: They stabilize the infinite ribbon and interconnect the surrounding chains into an open framework structure.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized materials are isomorphous and crystallize in a chiral orthogonal space group.
What is the role of the unique multifunctional ligand H2Pra2biim in the synthesis?
data.answer: It produced a novel series of helix-based MOFs of d10 transition metals.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized materials have been used as artificial nucleases for the hydrolytic cleavage of DNA and RNA.
What is the observed effect of the surrounding coordinating water molecules and propionate groups on the capping m3-OH groups?
data.answer: They account for the fusion of the triangular [Nd3(m3-OH)]8+ units in a side-sharing fashion to form an infinite ribbon.
